hints.content: Which of the shapes also has $4$ sides and $4$ angles?

This shape belongs in the group:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A four-sided shape. The top side is labeled 3 centimeters, the bottom side is labeled 5 centimeters, the left side is labeled 4 centimeters, and the right side is labeled 6 centimeters. !

question.content:
The following shapes all belong to the same group.

 |  | 
- | - | -
![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 6 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/baad14de1b84496e7058770952097bf91fb2eeb7) | ![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 8 meters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4de2f05ba3998111417aaccadd4e89b34b9ecf63) | ![A four-sided shape. The top and bottom sides are labeled 7 meters. The left and right sides are labeled 3 meters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a67c61f5aa44830b8fdde996724e665ebae403d9)

All of the shapes have $4$ sides and $4$ angles.

**Which of the following shapes belongs in the group?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A six-sided shape. Each side is labeled 9 meters.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/36770fa75ed89b335e85191f275e8a173bcada44)

![A four-sided shape. The top side is labeled 3 centimeters, the bottom side is labeled 5 centimeters, the left side is labeled 4 centimeters,  and the right side is labeled 6 centimeters.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/94d0bfff17b21633362364c9f7779a13cdcbed80)
![A six-sided shape. Each side is labeled 8 meters.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8a3f229a38f2a8481821432f47875cfcef0e2e5b)
![A three-sided shape. Each side is labeled 12 meters.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6d86bc714a76be88ed1f3973783ce68b54d6740d)
